name: gamess-ri-mp2-miniapp
description:
The GAMESS RI-MP2 mini-app computes the correlation energy with the
Hartree-Fock energy and wave-function given as inputs. The inputs were
generated from GAMESS.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description: Virtual package for the Message Passing Interface.

dependencies.name: lapack
dependencies.description:
Fujitsu SSL2 (Scientific Subroutine Library II) is Math library for
Fujitsu compiler. Fujitsu SSL2 implementation only for Fujitsu compiler.
Fujitsu SSL2 provides the function of blas, lapack and scalapack.
